name: DUST'S ECHO
description:
You are a mysterious traveler who has arrived at the far off town of Dust's Echo. Carry out the mission, interact with locals, leap from asteroid to asteroid, but most importantly: survive.

Made for Narrative Game Jam 3.

Programming by dominguerilla.

Story by u/F2AI.

Character portraits by Benobow.

Island model by NinjaKirby.
